text:
Well done Australia. We’ve just passed 2m downloads for COVIDSafe.  

But we’ve still got more to do keep you & your family safe, protect our doctors & nurses & help us get back to the way of life we love.

Join us in stopping the spread, download it now.

https://t.co/Cg7e1mK3eU
